Review Name: Wonderful Review Description: Writting review after using for 2 months. About Product, As usual amazing product by Bluestar. Cools quickly Energy efficient Very less noisey, both Indoor and Outdoor Only vertical swing flap is having bit issue by design (attached image), while the unit is powered off the flap is slightly open on right side as compared to left. (Few more buyers have shared similar image). About Delivery and Installation, Delivery was very quick even there was a lockdown. Installation was done after 6days of delivery, that too with some follow ups with Flipkart and Bluestar team.
